messages.message:
:large_yellow_square: :jenkins: I'll be restarting *Prod* Jenkins shortly, to get it updated and address some breaking telemetry issues with an old plugin version. :+1:

Jobs should generally pause and resume properly afterward.
:loading_wheel: Still underway, Prod has a rather hefty file ownership change to churn through on reboot. Should be a one-time slowdown of the startup

:red_circle: Something isn't working right on Prod Jenkins with the update, seems perhaps a plugin has been dropped or had a breaking change that slipped past. Rolling back for now and will dig in further.

:yellow_circle: Tentatively back up and good - jobs are working again, but the telemetry plugin is failing to load due to some manner of circular dependency. Still investigating and may need to restart a bit more but I'll try to keep posted here

:white_check_mark: All done!
There was a lot of mess with old plugins that have been abandoned for years, but were fine for a long time - they are now no longer 'fine'. :joy:

They've been removed and Prod Jenkins telemetry and upgrade are good to go!
